Considering the present state of Indian economy, outline five key agendas for the newly formed Central Government.

It always focused on the develepoment of their political wealth but not the wealth of the country. There was a tremondous unemployement these days. Due to all these reasons the economy downsized and the Infalton was very high.

                                         There are many hopes in the indian citizens about the newly formed government . As the governmnet has given many oaths in development of the country. Surely the new governmnet plays a prominent role developing india economically politically and socially. It has a crucial part in developemnet of economic wealth of the country . Most of the unemployed skilled talented will get a numerous opuurtunites .

So there should be no corruption in the goivernment offices.Each every corrupted officers should be suspended and punished. If such a rule like that then each and every government offices work very accurately.

3)Increase in the Education rate: There should be a high incerase in the education rate .  No child labors in this country are encouraged . To encourage the children under poverty  there should be free schools and free colleges who cannt effort for the costly education.  skill and talented peoples should be encouraged. There should be a good training given to the students in all the aspects of education. government should provide a quality education for the schools and colleges under their contol.

5)Development of agriculture:  India was know for the good crop fields and agriculture but from some past years it was not the same it changed a lot there is no development in the agriculture sector. Due to lack of the funds for the farmers and the natural calamities and also there no encouragement for the farmers as well . In order to develop and make the agriculture sector strong there should be some changes made in the government and there should be special schemes for the farmers in development of their fields.

There sholud be good quality manufacturing companies should arises to manufactuire quality goods .And only the indian bazars and indian malls should be araised inorder to increase the rupee rate.
